#### 180 A {-}

<div class="col2">

| *ỉr p.t   *
| *smn tȝ  *
| *bs Nwn   *
| *sḫpr mn.ty  *
| *ỉr nty qmȝ wnn.t  *
| *ẖnmw grg spȝ.wt  *
| 
| He who made heaven [^fn-180-1], 
| established the earth,
| made Nun come forth,
| and created the desert regions,
| who made what is and created what exists,
| Khnum who founded the nomes.

</div>

[^fn-180-1]: ![](images/180_1.png){width=50%}.

#### 180 B {-}

<div class="col2">

| *ỉȝw rnp r nw=f  *
| *nḫḫ pw ỉr ḥwnw  *
| *ṯȝw n ȝnḫ n nty nb  *
| *ẖnmw sḥḏ tȝ.wy n nfrw=f  *
| 
| Old man who rejuvenates at his time,
| i.e. the elder who becomes a youth,
| breath of life for all the is,
| Khnum who illumines the lands with his beauty.

</div>
